articles.title: Pyongyang City Delegation Leaves for Laos
articles.content:
Pyongyang City Delegation Leaves for Laos
						
 Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Pyongyang City led by Ryang Man Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee and chairman of the DPRK-Laos Friendship Association, left here Saturday to attend the celebrations of the 450th formation anniversary of Vientiane and the 20th anniversary of the Laos-DPRK Friendship Association to be held in Laos.

articles.title: International Wrestling Coach Workshop Held
articles.content:
International Wrestling Coach Workshop Held
						
 Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- An international Olympic solidarity wrestling coaches' course took place recently in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 It was attended by coaches of sports teams and teachers of juvenile sports schools in Pyongyang.
					
					 It, divided into theoretical and practical courses, dealt with teaching and training methods for wrestlers, working out of pre-match training program, body-weight control methods, coaches' technical instruction, etc.
					
					 It was undertaken by a FILA lecturer, Degi Bagayev.

articles.title: Systems at Iron and Steel Complex Put on CNC Basis
articles.content:
Various Systems at Iron and Steel Complex Put on CNC Basis 
						
  Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex has successfully put the power management and operation system and the electrode control system of the UHP electric arc furnace on a CNC basis.
					 This made it possible to control the power consumption according to the real time and put the power distribution including the alternative production according to the supply plan on a scientific basis and provided a foundation for increasing the production at the UHP electric arc furnace.
					
					 The complex introduced a new digital power management apparatus and the principle of sensing earth electric current to monitor the operation of power substations and ensure the balanced supply of electricity. By placing the electrode control system of the UHP electric arc furnace on a CNC basis it has come to ensure the security of electrodes, while remarkably decreasing the norm of electrode consumption, and increase the steel production by cutting down the melting time as compared with that in the past.

articles.title: Medical Properties of Kimchi
articles.content:
Medical Properties of Kimchi
						
 Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- Kimchi, one of the Korean nation's traditional dishes, has been publicly recognized as health food for its peculiar flavor, nutritive substances and medical properties.
					 The large amount of polysaccharide and lignin contained in kimchi promotes the function of stomach and intestines to help digestion. It is also efficacious for hypertension, hyperlipemia and other diseases as it makes viscous solution in intestines to lower cholesterol.
					
					 Kimchi includes vitamin A and C conducive to preventing aging and cancer and removing pathogenic microorganisms. 
					
					 Such medicinal materials as fruit of Crataegus pinnatifida can be used in preparation of kimchi.

articles.title: Youth Hero Motorway
articles.content:
Youth Hero Motorway 
 Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- Many monumental edifices built in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are associated with heroic feats of young people. 
					 Among them is the Youth Hero Motorway extending more than 40 kilometers from the fork to Mangyongdae to the Youth Bridge at the entrance of Nampho City. 
					
					 The huge project, completed in October Juche 89 (2000) less than two years after the groundbreaking, strikingly demonstrated the indomitable mental power of the Korean youth to add luster to Kim Il Sung's Korea with the might of single-hearted unity.
					
					 They carried out the project though they lacked such things as machinery, fuel, cement, steel and timber, as well as food.
					
					 They provided earth for roadbed by themselves, converting several hundred hectares of cropland into fields of standardized shapes.
					
					 They removed much more than ten million cubic meters of earth, successfully finished the concrete tamping covering tens of thousands of cubic meters, planted millions of trees of some 60 species to create 30-meter wide forests on either side of the road and improved nearby streams.  
					
					 They also built several dozen hectares of vineyards and thousands of dwelling houses in some areas along the motorway, adding beauty to their landscape. 
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il published a famous work, "The Youth Hero Motorway Is a Great Product of Our Party's Idea of Attaching Importance to the Youth", on November 13, 2000 to highly appreciate the feats performed by young men and women in the project.

articles.title: Imperialists Accused of Crimes under "Human Rights Protection"
articles.content:
Imperialists Accused of Crimes under "Human Rights Protection" 
 Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- Military invasion and threat to sovereign states are going on in the international arena and vicious attempts are getting pronounced to bring down the socio-political systems of other countries by conspiratorial methods. Imperialists are perpetrating these crimes under the signboard of "human rights protection."
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Imperialists are using human rights issues as levers to achieve their sinister aims. 
					
					 They persistently pull up other countries over their "human rights issues" whenever an opportunity presents itself. A typical example of this is the behavior of the United States.
					
					 There can be no unique standard for human rights proper to all other countries of the world which differ from each other in their histories, cultural traditions, level of development and way of life. Moreover, the Western-style "standard of human rights" touted by the U.S. has no universality and impartiality as it is reactionary and unjust. That is why it is rebuffed in every part of the world. The above-said standard which  the U.S. seeks to impose on other countries is aimed at making their "view on value" and way of life prevail in all other countries in a bid to get the world obedient to Washington and put it under its control. Herein lie the reactionary essence and goal of the imperialists' touted "human rights protection." 
					
					 Imperialists are now becoming crafty in their moves to justify their aggression and interference in the internal affairs of other countries and human rights abuses under the signboard of "human rights protection". This, however, brings their true colors as criminals into bolder relief. 
					
					 They would be well advised to face up to the present reality and stop using the hypocritical signboard of "human rights protection."

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Stand for Improved Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Stand for Improved Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- Now all Koreans at home and abroad unanimously desire detente on the Korean Peninsula and the improved north-south relations, but the south Korean ruling forces are laying stumbling blocks in the way of dialogue and cooperation, putting up unreasonable preconditions. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article:
					
					 What merits attention is that the south Korean authorities, crying out for the settlement of the "Cheonan" case and the nuclear issue, are absurdly asserting they cannot opt for dialogue and cooperation unless the above-said issues are solved. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities are using the warship case and the nuclear issue as a bargaining chip for stoking hostility toward fellow countrymen and escalating the racket of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean ruling forces' insistence that they cannot opt for dialogue and cooperation unless the nuclear issue is solved cannot be interpreted otherwise than a far-fetched assertion intended to hamstring any process to improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the south Korean authorities are vitiating the atmosphere of inter-Korean dialogue and cooperation by openly disclosing their sinister scenario for a preemptive attack upon the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean rulers would be well advised to face up to the trend of the times toward the improved inter-Korean relations and national reunification and behave themselves. They had better make a switchover in their treacherous and anti-reunification "policy toward the north".

articles.title: S. Korea Accused of Trying to Cover up Truth about "Cheonan" Case
articles.content:
S. Korea Accused of Trying to Cover up Truth about "Cheonan" Case
 Pyongyang, November 13 (KCNA) -- The Media and Academic Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration on November 9 issued a joint statement accusing the puppet Ministry of Defence of trying to cover up the truth about the "Cheonan" warship case. 
					 The statement blasted the ministry for letting loose a whole string of nonsensical rhetoric in a bid to destroy evidence by taking shell off the inside of the torpedo propelling body. 
					
					 Herein lies its sinister aim to hide the falsity of the results of the investigation into the "Cheonan" case published by it at any cost, the statement added. 
					
					 Casting doubt about the fact that the ministry only sent a photo to an institution, asking it to analyze the ingredients of the shell, the statement held that this indicates itself that it is trying to dodge a proper probe into the truth about the case. 
					
					 Truth is bound to be probed, the statement noted, demanding the south Korean "government" conduct inspection of state administration to properly probe the truth behind the case.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza el falso cartel de "defensa de DDHH"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza el falso cartel de "defensa de DDHH"
						
Pyongyang, 13 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En la escena internacional no paran la invasion y amenaza militares contra los Estados soberanos y se tornan mas graves los sucios intentos de derrocar mediante el complot el regimen sociopolitico de otros paises. Los imperialistas utilizan en esta campana el cartel de "defensa de los derechos humanos".
					  Asi revela el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 13 y continua:
					
					  Los imperialistas, principalmente EE.UU., no pierden ninguna oportunidad para acusar a otros paises del "problema de DDHH".
					
					  En el mundo no puede haber una pauta universal de DDHH que convenga a todos los paises con diferentes historias, tradiciones culturales, niveles de desarrollo, modos de vida, etc.
					
					  En particular, la "norma de DDHH" del Occidente, elogiada tanto por EE.UU., es repudiada en todas partes del mundo porque es reaccionaria e injusta y no tiene ninguna universalidad e imparcialidad.
					
					  A pesar de esto, EE.UU. la impone a otros paises para que pueda controlar el mundo a sus caprichos al hacer prevalecer en todos los paises su "concepcion de valor" y modo de vida. He aqui la esencia y la meta reaccionarias de la cantinela de "defensa de DDHH" de los imperialistas.
					
					  Aunque ellos usan este falso cartel para justificar la agresion, la intervencion y la violacion de DDHH contra otros paises, se ve cada vez mas clara su naturaleza de criminal.
					
					  Los imperialistas deben ver bien la realidad de hoy y dejar de usar ese enganoso cartel.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica acciones en contra del alivio de tension
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica acciones en contra del alivio de tension
						
Pyongyang, 13 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Ahora, todos los coreanos en el interior y el exterior del pais desean el relajamiento de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y la mejora de las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					  Sin embargo, las fuerzas dominantes surcoreanas obstaculizan seriamente el dialogo y la cooperacion presentando injustas condiciones.
					
					  Al respecto, el periodico Rodong Sinmun publico en su edicion de este sabado un articulo individual.
					
					  Lo insoslayable es que las autoridades surcoreanas insisten injustamente en que no pueden proceder al dialogo y cooperacion sin que fueran solucionados el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" y el problema nuclear.
					
					  Estos temas son las cartas de ellas para inculcar la hostilidad a los connacionales, endurecer la campana de enfrentamiento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea e impedir el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					  Ademas, ellas envenenan el ambiente de dialogo y cooperacion entre ambas partes revelando abiertamente su siniestra intencion de atacar preventivamente a la RPDC.
					
					  Los gobernantes surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia viendo correctamente la corriente de la epoca hacia la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur y la reunificacion de la patria y cambiar su "politica sobre el Norte" de caracter antinacional y anti-reunificacion.

articles.title: Aplicada tecnologia CNC en Hwangchol
articles.content:
Aplicada tecnologia CNC en Hwangchol
						
Pyongyang, 13 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae (Hwangchol) modernizo usando la tecnologia CNC el sistema de manejo y administracion de la electricidad y el de control de electrodo del horno electrico UHP.
					De esta manera, se abrieron las posibilidades de evaluar en tiempo real el consumo de electricidad y distribuirla cientificamente mediante la organizacion de la produccion alternada segun el plan de suministro y se sento la base para aumentar la produccion en el horno UHP.
					
					En el complejo se introdujeron el aparato digital de control de energia electrica y el principio sensorial de la corriente electrica conectada a tierra para asegurar la observacion del estado de las estaciones electricas y el suministro electrico equilibrado en ellas.
					
					La aplicacion de la tecnologia CNC en el sistema de control de electrodo del horno UHP permitio rebajar mucho el consumo de electrodo, garantizar la seguridad de este y reducir el tiempo de fundicion de hierro.

articles.title: Se imparte en Pyongyang cursillo para entrenadores de lucha
articles.content:
Se imparte en Pyongyang cursillo para entrenadores de lucha
						
  Pyongyang, 13 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Se impartio recientemente en Corea el cursillo para los entrenadores de lucha en solidaridad con la olimpiada internacional.
					  En la ocasion participaron los entrenadores de los equipos deportivos y los maestros de las escuelas deportivas de jovenes y ninos en la capital.
					
					  Hubo lecciones teoricas y practicas en que fueron  abordados unos temas como el metodo docente de entrenamiento a los jugadores, la elaboracion del plan de entrenamiento antes de la competencia, el metodo de ajuste del peso corporal, la direccion tecnica de los entrenadores, etc.
					
					  El cursillo estuvo a cargo de un lector de la Federacion Internacional de Lucha.
